title: Sibling Advicery: Meeting Queens/Learning to Read
itunes:author: Sibling Rivalry & Studio71
content:encoded:
Not out to your family and trying to get out of family commitments to go to Pride? Struggling to set up boundaries with your friends? Don't know how to go up to drag queen in a non-annoying way? Getting too good at reading people to filth that it's ruining friendships? This week on Sibling Advicery, non-experts Bob and Monét listen/read your submissions and give their two cents on what they think you should do!!

Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!

@BobTheDragQueen
